+--------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Package                                                | Description                                                                                                                                            |
+========================================================+========================================================================================================================================================+
| [`mleap`](/packages/mleap/latest/index.md)             | A `sparklyr` extension that provides an interface to [MLeap](https://github.com/combust/mleap), which allows us to take Spark pipelines to production. |
+--------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [`graphframes`](/packages/graphframes/latest/index.md) | Enables graph analysis in Spark via GraphFrames                                                                                                        |
+--------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [`sparktf`](/packages/sparktf/latest/index.md)         | Allows writing of Spark DataFrame's to TFRecord, the recommended format for persisting data to be used in training with TensorFlow                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [`sparkxgb`](/packages/sparkxgb/latest/index.md)       | A `sparklyr` extension that provides an interface to [XGBoost](https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost) on Spark.                                              |
+--------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
